summary:
With more than 15 years of experience in the Food & Beverage industry; 11 years as a Restaurant Manager / Operations Manager.
I started my career as a runner at Leila Restaurant where I managed to become the restaurant manager after 4 years of dedication and hard work. Along the way I completed my two bachelor degrees in Hospitality Management and Hotel Management.
After gaining this experience, I shifted to being a restaurant manager (opening team) at Al Falamanki Dubai for 5 years, and then I have worked as an Operations Manager at Neighborhood then at Shish w Shi where I managed to deal with everything related to Operations and being, at the same time, the Restaurant Manager to the opening of the restaurant.
The growth and profitability of the establishments I’ve managed are proof of my abilities.
